de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.similarity.date

Class YearSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.similarity.SimilarityMeasure<org.joda.time.DateTime>
      • de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.similarity.date.YearSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class YearSimilarity
extends SimilarityMeasure<org.joda.time.DateTime>
    SimilarityMeasure, that calculates the similarity of the year parts of two dates with respect to a maximum difference.
    Author:
    Oliver Lehmberg (oli@dwslab.de)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YearSimilarity(int maxDifference)
      Initialize YearSimilarity with a maximal difference (in years).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • YearSimilarity

        public YearSimilarity(int maxDifference)
        Initialize YearSimilarity with a maximal difference (in years). In case the difference is larger the maximal difference, the calculated similarity is 0. In the other cases its 1-(diff/maxDifference).
        Parameters:
        maxDifference - maximal difference between two dates in years.
